title: “Beneficiary” shall mean hutment dwellers found eligible as protected occupiers, as defined in the Slum Act and /or orders issued thereunder
clause_text: “Beneficiary” shall mean hutment dwellers found eligible as protected occupiers, as defined in the Slum Act and /or orders issued thereunder.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
